name: Doctor What
description:
A game about a doctor trying to cure the infected. He must stop the infection spreading, by curing as many people he can.

Game Rules:

Goal: Cure all curable citizens within each level without dying.

  • Avoid trash cans as best you can, as they will trigger uncurable enemies to endlessley chase you
  • E - Potion to heal the curable enemies
  • Left Click - Potion to Freeze Uncurable enemies for a time
  • You can gain health by touching potions
